Name: Kumrat Camping Tour
Itinerary: Camping experience in Kumrat Valley with visits to Kala Chasma waterfall, streams, and forest areas. Includes guided hikes and nature experiences.

Name: Jahaz Banda Kumrat
Itinerary: Luxury package visiting Thal, Thal Mosque, Kumrat Forest, Waterfall, Taki Panda, Jahaz Banda, Kund Waterfall, Kund Panda, and Katura Lake.

Name: Jahaz Banda Katora Lake
Itinerary: Tour package including Kumrat Falls, Kala Chashma, Katora Lake, Jahaz Banda Meadows, Thar, Panjkora River, and Kumrat Forest with jeep tours and guided hikes.
